_header: The holy Pope Innocent so God gave the case
Subjects: Innocent I, pope, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of Pope Innocent I, in one MS of the South English Legendary

Bod779.First Lines:
Þe holy pope Innosent so god ȝaf pe casIn
                    þe lond of abdane ich woot I bore he was…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…to come to þe ioye þat he is in I dyȝtfor
                    þe loue of innocent so wel so þou myȝt
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 411-12.
